description_for_human: The verify-everything infrastructure for Agents. Includes certified scraping, memory, identity, and math. All responses are cryptographically signed.
description_for_model: A suite of verifiable infrastructure tools. Use these when you need liability protection, audit trails, or certified results. All tools require x402 payment.

tools.name: basis_fetch
tools.description: Fetches a URL and returns cleaned text with a cryptographic signature. Use for reading articles or static sites.

tools.name: basis_badge
tools.description: Verifies if a wallet address is allowed/safe and issues a session badge. Use before transacting with unknown wallets.

tools.name: basis_cache
tools.description: Stores short-term memory keys with a proof of custody receipt. Use to persist context between sessions.

tools.name: basis_calc
tools.description: Executes deterministic math formulas in a cleanroom. Use for financial calculations where LLMs might hallucinate.

tools.name: basis_hash
tools.description: Timestamps an event hash on the blockchain. Use to create an immutable audit log of an action.

tools.name: basis_scan
tools.description: Classifies an image using AI and signs the confidence score. Use to identify receipts, documents, or safety risks.
